body.section: Hierarchy EmployerSponsor is a kind of PlanSponsor

section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents an Employer which has assumed financial responsibility for an insured group.

stentry.p: "Holds the group employer ID for the insured’s insurance." - HL7 Version 2.8, IN1-10.
"Contains the name of the employer that provides the employee’s insurance." - HL7 Version 2.8, IN1-11.
